member.name: DWRITE_MATRIX
member.summary: The DWRITE_MATRIX structure specifies the graphics transform to be applied to rendered glyphs.

member.name: DWRITE_MATRIX.m11
member.summary: A value indicating the horizontal scaling / cosine of rotation.

member.name: DWRITE_MATRIX.m12
member.summary: A value indicating the vertical shear / sine of rotation.

member.name: DWRITE_MATRIX.m21
member.summary: A value indicating the horizontal shear / negative sine of rotation.

member.name: DWRITE_MATRIX.m22
member.summary: A value indicating the vertical scaling / cosine of rotation.

member.name: DWRITE_MATRIX.dx
member.summary: A value indicating the horizontal shift (always orthogonal regardless of rotation).

member.name: DWRITE_MATRIX.dy
member.summary: A value indicating the vertical shift (always orthogonal regardless of rotation.)
